_header: God made Adam the first day of the moon
Title(s): Nota for the days of the moone
_description: Nota for the days of the moone — seventeen couplets

BodDig88.First Lines:
God made Adam the fyrst day of þe mooneAnd the secunde day Eve
                    good dedis to doon…
BodDig88.Last Lines:
…And the xxx day for to spedeBegynne noo werke as I the
                    rede
BodDig88.Attributed Title: ‘Nota for the days of the Moone’ (f. 62)
BodDig88.Editions:
Robbins,  Rossell Hope,
                        ed.  
             Secular Lyrics of the XIV and XV Centuries.
         2nd ed. Oxford: Clarendon, 1955: 248-9.
